acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO)

business_details.Business: CR put up today. CCL sent to observation home till 24-12-2019. I/O of this case Krishanu Pathak is directed to get the ossification test of the CCL done and submit the report on or before the next date fixed.

CCL is produced from Observation Home Boko. I/O submitted ossification report. From the ossification report Suman Ray is found to be CCL.  LAC Kaushik Das is appointed to defend the case of CCL.  Inform DLSA , Bongaigaon. Copies furnished to CCL. Perused the CR. Offence explained to CCL to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. Issue summon to PWs.CCL is sent to Observation Home, Boko.
CCL is produced from observation home ,Boko. Ld LAC is present. Three PWs are examined and discharged. Issue summon to M.O and I.O
CCl is produced from observation home, Boko. LAC is present. M.O is examined and discharged.Issue fresh summon to I/O. The CCL is sent back to observation home,Boko till 17/1/20
PM is on CL. CCL produced from observation home , Boko. He is remanded back to OH, Boko.
CCL is produced from observation home ,Boko. I/O is present. He is examined and discharged. PWs closed. CCL sent back to O.H,Boko till 6/2/20.
PM is on transfer. CCL is produced from O/H , Boko . CCL is sent back to O/H, Boko till 20/2/20.

PM is on transfer. CICL Suman Ray is produced from Observation Home, Boko. The father of the CICL has filed a petition praying for Zimma of the CICL. Perused the case record, it is seen that the CICL Suman Ray is staying in Observation Home, Boko since 26/10/2019.Considering the length of the stay in Observation Home, as well as the good behaviour of the CCL, he is allowed to go on Zimma of Rs 10,000/-. Petition allowed. Later on, Bailor Dhiru Ram Ray has submitted Zimma Bond on behalf of CCL Siman Ray which is seen, examined and verified found correcr and accepted.
CCL is present.  The statement of the CCL is recorded US 313 Cr.Pc.
